name: Rooftop Run Rush
description:
Tie your shoes, it has got real. You will be jumping, rolling and sliding on rooftops in an urban environment especially designed for excitement.
Parkour is your way to go to finish levels by combining rolling, running, jumping and sliding to overcome challenges.
Rooftop Run Rush is specifically designed for excitement and adrenaline while moving from the start to the end.
Run freely, combine great movements, and finish hundreds of thrilling levels. We present to you amazing visuals, smooth controls and daring challenges.
Amplify your sensations and do incredible parkour movements to complete endless intense levels.

FEATURES
- Epics jumps from heights
- Glass Breaking
- Escaping from the enemies

Unleash your parkour spirit by playing Rooftop Run Rush!
Download it NOW!
